set-variable.value:
#[%dw 2.0 output application/json
--- if((payload.request.arguments[0] default {}).appName != null) (payload.request.arguments[0].appName) else (payload.session.attributes.appName)]
set-variable.doc:name: Set Variable vAppName

set-variable.value:
#[%dw 2.0 output application/json
--- if((payload.request.arguments[0] default {}).envId != null) (payload.request.arguments[0].envId) else (payload.session.attributes.envId)]
set-variable.doc:name: Set Variable vEnvId
Set Variable vStats

set-variable.value:
#[%dw 2.0 output application/json
var appName = vars.vAppName var finalAppData = (flatten(vars.vMasterMap.idMapping.environments..apps default []) filter ((item, index) -> upper(item.appName) == upper(appName)))[0] default {} --- { "muleVersion": finalAppData.muleVersion.version, "totalProps": sizeOf(finalAppData.properties default {}), "appStatus": finalAppData.appStatus, "region": finalAppData.region, "cpu": vars.vStats.cpu, "memory": vars.vStats.memory }]
set-variable.doc:name: Copy_of_Set Variable vResponse

http:request.doc:name: Request to ANYPOINT EXP - Get Master Map
http:request.http:body: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "apAccessToken": vars.vTokenPayload.apAccessToken, "userName": vars.vTokenPayload.userName, "email": vars.vTokenPayload.email, "userId": vars.vTokenPayload.userId }]

set-payload.doc:name: Set Payload FInd App Status Intent Request

when.expression: #[(payload.request.arguments[0] != null and typeOf(payload.request.arguments[0]) != String and payload.request.arguments[0].appName != null and (payload.request.arguments[0].intentName default "") == "FindAppStatusIntent")]

logger.doc:name: LOG INFO Got App Name or App Number Slot
logger.message: Got App Name or App Number Slot

when.expression: #[(payload.request.arguments[0] != null and typeOf(payload.request.arguments[0]) != String and payload.request.arguments[0].envName != null and (payload.request.token default "") == "FindAppStatusIntent")]

#[(payload.request.arguments[0] != null and typeOf(payload.request.arguments[0]) != String and payload.request.arguments[0].orgName != null and (payload.request.token default "") == "FindAppStatusIntent")]

ee:transform.doc:name: DW SET Find APp Status Intent Response

logger.doc:name: LOG INFO Find Status Dialogue started

ee:transform.doc:name: DW SET Find APp Status Intent Response
